about_the_game:
Fatal Falls is a narrative-driven psychological horror game set within the opulent but unsettling Grand Elysium hotel. In this playable demo, you'll experience a portion of the full game, focusing on the following features:

  • Interactive Storyline: Engage in intense, emotional conversations with several key guests, each struggling with their own psychological battles. Every choice you make has a direct impact on the outcome of these interactions, which may lead to life-saving or tragic consequences.

  • Exploration of The Grand Elysium: Explore a section of the luxury hotel, where you’ll uncover disturbing secrets hidden beneath the polished façade. As you investigate, you’ll begin to see cracks in the hotel’s seemingly perfect environment.

  • Character-Driven Gameplay: Meet and engage with a handful of The Grand Elysium’s guests, each with a unique backstory and mental health challenges. The demo offers a glimpse into the struggles of a few characters, allowing players to shape their fates.

  • Choice-Based Mechanic: Every conversation is a branching path where your choices matter. The demo showcases this key feature by allowing players to influence specific guests through dialogue, leading to multiple potential outcomes.

This demo introduces the core mechanics and themes of Fatal Falls, focusing on narrative depth, player choices, and the tension between empathy and horror. The full version will expand on this, offering more characters, deeper storylines, and additional areas of the hotel to explore.

content_descriptors.notes: This game mainly revolves around mental health issues and suicide. It contains occasional graphic violence and some strong bad language.

short_description: In Fatal Falls you explore the dark secrets of "The Grand Elysium", a posh luxury hotel. Interact with its guests, drink a cocktail at the bar, peruse the noble premises – the choice is yours! Just make sure you choose appropriate answers when talking to people who are mentally unstable...
